* Sample rate, bit depth
* File naming conventions
* Asset folder structure
* Memory budgets (RAM streaming requirements)
* CPU performance budgets
* Platform-specific restrictions
* Concurrency rules
* Voice limits per category
* Loudness standards (dialogue, music, SFX)
